about_the_game:
Welcome, Librarian!

This is the Magic Library.
We archive and store ‘all there is’ and lend them to those in need, but the ruckus caused by the ever-increasing Doodlers has currently put a stop to all our work.
I’m sure you already know, but each book is very precious to us as the unique records contained within them can form entire worlds on their own.

It’s even more valuable to those who have a personal connection to the books as they hold a precious memory or act as a guiding light for the future.
Imagine what would happen to the books if the Doodlers become more rampant?
Just imagining it is terrifying!
They change the content of the books, making it impossible to understand them.

So please help us! We quickly separated the tainted books in the library but we need more help to catch all the Doodlers.
Please protect the precious records from the Doodlers!


Welcome to the Magic Library!

Our Magic Library is located in Differlands. It is the ultimate archive that holds all books, documents, records, prints of the entire multiverse.
We store records of 'all there is’, so there are librarians of many different beings here, all working together in sections most suited to their specialty.


Librarian?

Just like librarians on Earth, the librarians here also work to protect and manage records as well as provide information. The difference is that our clientele includes not just humans, but also beings from multiple dimensions as well (Even so-called gods!).
Oh, but let’s not forget the most important task. Exterminating the Doodlers!


Doodlers?

I guess you could call them bookworms. Of course, they are very different from the bookworms on Earth. Doodlers aren’t insects. They’re mischievous little fairies.
They're about as big as a human child’s hand and look like circular scribbles clumped together. They can clump and separate their scribbly bodies to cause chaos within the books’ worlds. Cute, you say? Absolutely not!
Doodlers hide inside the books in disguise. If you leave them in there, they’ll sabotage the books!
They also tend to disguise themselves and hide inside books, making it quite easy to miss them. If you don’t get rid of them, not only will they turn the book’s contents into an utter mess, but they’ll also eventually consume everything, leaving nothing behind!


Troublemakers

Some books may even hold Troublemakers, born because of the Doodlers. They’ll show up in many forms to harass you. Maybe as a villain, or even an alien. You can never know how they’ll appear before you.
To find the Doodlers fast, you must use the items in your hand wisely.
Use the items to remove the obstacles and find the Doodlers.
A raygun will be very handy for getting rid of the rascal aliens, and a watergun to remove the paints.


Me?
Well, you’re you! Today, you must become a ★Special Librarian★ to help other librarians and the denizens of the books as well!
- Find the difference between the two views in front of you, whether it be people, objects, or the landscape, and select them with the controller.
- You may have to pay close attention to your surroundings or compare a small map to the vast landscape.
- Bookworms called ‘Doodlers’ are hiding in some parts of the pictures. Find them all to restore the ruined magic books to their former state.

How can I get a higher score?
- Don’t make mistakes and be fast.
- To receive the best reward, make full use of your sharp eyes, patience, and a little bit of luck.
- When you clear the stage, you’ll get a score based on your skills.

name: Differlands

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i5-4590 / AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1070 / AMD equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
  • VR Support: Quest / Quest 2
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 or higher
  • Processor: Intel i5-4590 / AMD equivalent or greater
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1070 / AMD 500 equivalent or greater
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • VR Support: Quest / Quest 2

short_description: A simple Spot-the-Difference can become a completely new game when combined with VR. Enjoy a Spot-the-Difference Game that goes beyond time and space! Only you and your sharp set of eyes can save the librarians of the Magic Library from their peril.
